QuestData.Title: Victory for the Horde
QuestData.Description:
You have accomplished the impossible.
The brood mother of the Black Dragonflight lies dead at your feet. Take her head and present it to the Warchief's advisor Eitrigg.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Head of Onyxia to Eitrigg in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Thrall's stoic demeanor changes for a split second when he sees the enormous head of Onyxia. The mighty Doomhammer was nearly unsheathed.>
QuestData.RewardText: This is a great victory for the Horde, $N. So many times you have honored your Warchief. It is time for the Warchief to honor you.
